name: Park Tool 106 Work Tray
description: Keep your spare parts, tools and lube organized and accessible on your bike repair stand.Features 2 deep-walled compartments, tool or towel bar, lube holder and a tab to hang a plastic trash bag.Direct fit onto PCS-10, PCS-11, PRS-25 and PRS-15.Used with 106-AC accessory collar (sold separately), the 106 tray fits 35-37mm upright tubes like on the PCS-9 and current PCS-1, PCS-4, PCS-4-1, PCS-4-2.
